content: The key will be deactivated after: {{date}}

comment.text: The APIKeyDeactivated translation key is used to display a message indicating when an API key will be deactivated, typically on a settings or configuration page. This text appears as a tooltip when the "API Key Deactivated" status is displayed in a UI component.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Spanish translation includes "después después de:" which is redundant. It should be just "después de:" for a more natural and accurate translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: La clave se desactivará después de: {{date}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'The key will be deactivated after:' is better translated as 'The key will be disabled after:' or 'The key's validity will expire after:' to better convey the intended meaning. 'Կանջատվի' (kanjativ) often implies a sudden disconnection rather than a scheduled deactivation or expiration.
While 'ետո' (heto) is grammatically correct, it might sound slightly less natural in this context. A more fluent phrasing would benefit from a more sophisticated wording.
The word 'desactivada' is a variant of 'desativada' which is more commonly used in Portuguese.

The translation "යතුර {{date}} පසු නිෂ්ක්‍රීය කරනු ලැබේ." is a literal translation that doesn't flow naturally in Sinhala. ' පසු' (passu) implies 'after' but sounds slightly awkward in this context. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the future action.
While the variable {{date}} is correctly included, consistent formatting should be ensured across all translations in the application.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure the variable is consistently formatted as {{date}} in all Sinhala translations.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of 'deactivated' is not ideal. 'Vô hiệu hóa' implies rendering something ineffective, but 'deactivated' in this context means the key will stop working. A better translation would convey the cessation of functionality.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Khóa sẽ ngừng hoạt động sau: {{date}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '该密钥将于该时间后无效：{{date}}' is not the most natural or accurate rendering of 'The key will be deactivated after: {{date}}'.  '该时间' (this time) is redundant and doesn't accurately convey the meaning of a specific future date.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 该密钥将在{{date}}失效 (Gai keyi zai {{date}} xiaoshi)
